summary: Alexa is a very shy princess from a contemporary, modern kingdom who discovers a secret door that opens to a magical land.
cast: Kelly Sheridan|Brittany McDonald|Ashleigh Ball|Chanelle Peloso|Tabitha St. Germain|Ellie King|Christopher Gaze|Jonathan Holmes|Britt Irvin|Michael Daingerfield|Mackenzie Gray|Andrea Libman|Anna Galvin|Andrew Francis|Jay Brazeau|Teryl Rothery|Arielle Tuliao|Peter Kelamis|Richard Ian Cox|Ali Liebert
director: Director: Karen J. Lloyd (as Karen J Lloyd)
title: Barbie y la puerta secreta
